Sentence: JINAN , June 24 ( Xinhua ) China late this year will start building a nuclear-powered desalinator project in Yantai City in east China 's Shandong Province , with a designed capacity of producing 52 million tons of fresh water a year .

JINAN , June 24 ( Xinhua ) China late this year will start building a nuclear-powered desalinator project in Yantai City in east China 's Shandong Province , with a designed capacity of producing 52 million tons of fresh water a year .

extent: Officials with the Development Planning Commission of the Shandong provincial government

mentionArg2.extent: the Development Planning Commission of the Shandong provincial government

mentionArg1.extent: Officials with the Development Planning Commission of the Shandong provincial government

Sentence: Officials with the Development Planning Commission of the Shandong provincial government said the project , to be built in cooperation with Qinghua University , would alleviate water shortages in the city and other parts of the Shandong Peninsula .

Sentence: Officials with the Development Planning Commission of the Shandong provincial government said the project , to be built in cooperation with Qinghua University , would alleviate water shortages in the city and other parts of the Shandong Peninsula .

extent: other parts of the Shandong Peninsula

mentionArg1.extent: other parts of the Shandong Peninsula

Sentence: Officials with the Development Planning Commission of the Shandong provincial government said the project , to be built in cooperation with Qinghua University , would alleviate water shortages in the city and other parts of the Shandong Peninsula .
Yantai and other parts of Shandong suffered acute water shortages due to droughts in recent years , changing climate and other reasons .

extent: director of the Nuclear Energy Technology and Design Institute attached to Qinghua University

mentionArg2.extent: the Nuclear Energy Technology and Design Institute attached to Qinghua University

mentionArg1.extent: director of the Nuclear Energy Technology and Design Institute attached to Qinghua University

Sentence: Zhang Zuoyi , director of the Nuclear Energy Technology and Design Institute attached to Qinghua University , was quoted in Monday 's Beijing Evening News as saying the fresh water to be produced from the project will cost 3.75 yuan per ton , much less than the cost of water from existing sources .
